description: A tunneled port catheter is a device used for long-term venous access that is placed under the skin and has a port for connecting to an infusion system.

attributes.name: Presence of Tunneled Port Catheter
attributes.description: Indicates whether a tunneled port catheter is present or not.

values.name: Present
values.description: A tunneled port catheter is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: A tunneled port catheter is absent.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Indicates the status of the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: New placement
values.description: The tunneled port catheter is newly placed.

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: The tunneled port catheter is unchanged.

values.name: Migrated
values.description: The tunneled port catheter has migrated from its original placement.

values.name: Removed
values.description: The tunneled port catheter has been removed.

attributes.name: Appropriate location
attributes.description: Indicates whether the tunneled port catheter is in an appropriate location.

values.name: Yes
values.description: The tunneled port catheter is in an appropriate location.

values.name: No
values.description: The tunneled port catheter is not in an appropriate location.

attributes.name: Side
attributes.description: Indicates the side of the body where the tunneled port catheter is located.

values.name: Left
values.description: The tunneled port catheter is on the left side of the body.

values.name: Right
values.description: The tunneled port catheter is on the right side of the body.

attributes.name: Number of Lumens
attributes.description: Indicates the number of lumens (channels) in the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: Single
values.description: The tunneled port catheter has a single lumen.

values.name: Double
values.description: The tunneled port catheter has two lumens.

attributes.name: Vein approach
attributes.description: Indicates the vein approach used for inserting the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: Internal jugular
values.description: The tunneled port catheter was inserted through the internal jugular vein.

values.name: Subclavian
values.description: The tunneled port catheter was inserted through the subclavian vein.

attributes.name: Course
attributes.description: Indicates the course of the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: Appropriate
values.description: The tunneled port catheter has an appropriate course.

values.name: Kinking
values.description: The tunneled port catheter is kinking.

values.name: Coiling
values.description: The tunneled port catheter is coiling.

attributes.name: Distal tip location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the distal tip of the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: Subclavian vein
values.description: The distal tip of the tunneled port catheter is in the subclavian vein.

values.name: Brachiocephalic vein
values.description: The distal tip of the tunneled port catheter is in the brachiocephalic vein.

values.name: SVC
values.description: The distal tip of the tunneled port catheter is in the superior vena cava (SVC).

values.name: Superior cavoatrial junction
values.description: The distal tip of the tunneled port catheter is in the superior cavoatrial junction.

values.name: Azygous vein
values.description: The distal tip of the tunneled port catheter is in the azygous vein.

values.name: Inferior cavoatrial junction
values.description: The distal tip of the tunneled port catheter is in the inferior cavoatrial junction.

values.name: Internal jugular vein
values.description: The distal tip of the tunneled port catheter is in the internal jugular vein.

attributes.name: Port location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the port of the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: Pectoral
values.description: The port of the tunneled port catheter is in the pectoral area.

values.name: Abdominal
values.description: The port of the tunneled port catheter is in the abdominal area.

attributes.name: Complications
attributes.description: Indicates the complications associated with the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: None
values.description: There are no complications associated with the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: Occlusion
values.description: There is occlusion (blockage) in the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: Catheter fracture
values.description: The tunneled port catheter has fractured.

values.name: Port displacement
values.description: The port of the tunneled port catheter has displaced.

values.name: Thrombosis (fibrin sheath)
values.description: There is a thrombosis (fibrin sheath) in the tunneled port catheter.

values.name: Tip migration
values.description: The distal tip of the tunneled port catheter has migrated.
